channel.title: thunar on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe
channel.description: Recent content in thunar on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: fmb
item.description: fmbdsplits.png fmb - Run or raise a plain notes sublime instance. SYNOPSIS fmb [-v|-h|] [-i FMB_INSTANCE] DESCRIPTION This command is just a shortcut to a complex command used to run or raise a thunar instance with a special instance name and settings applied. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. -i FMB_INSTANCE Instance name to give the filemanager window. Defautlt: filemanager_b ENVIRONMENT FMB_INSTANCE If non-null rename instance name of filemanager window.

item.title: fmd
item.description: fmbdsplits.png fmd - Run or raise a plain notes sublime instance. SYNOPSIS fmd [-v|-h|] [-i FMD_INSTANCE] DESCRIPTION This command is just a shortcut to a complex command used to run or raise a thunar instance with a special instance name and settings applied. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. -i FMD_INSTANCE Instance name to give the filemanager window. Defautlt: filemanager_d ENVIRONMENT FMD_INSTANCE If non-null rename instance name of filemanager window.

item.title: gotofolder
item.description: gotofolder - Open folder and adjust layout in thunar SYNOPSIS gotofolder [-v|-h] FOLDER DESCRIPTION gotofolder opens FOLDER in thunar and adjust the layout depending on the path of the folder. OPTIONS -v Show version and exit. -h Show help and exit. DEPENDENCIES thunar i3get
